citeinfo.origin: Russian Academy of Science, P.P. Shirshov Institute of Oceanology
citeinfo.title: Coccolithophorids in the Eastern Bering Sea Phytoplankton: Before and During Anomalous 1997 Bloom

descript.abstract: Unusual conditions occurred in the eastern Bering Sea in spring - summer 1997. Ice retreating was very rapid, numbers of storms were reduced, amount of cloud free days were extraordinary high, upper mixed layer was anomalously shallow, sea surface temperature in summer was > 4Â°C above normal and water column stratification was extremely sharp.
descript.purpose: To show coccolithophorids in the Eastern Bering Sea Phytoplankton: Before and During anomalous 1997 Bloom
